title: ADC Looking for Support For Duo Bronze/Silver
body:
Currently maining adc and not having a great time with the supports I get matched with. When I play with my friend as support the game becomes a joke with how easy it is but on my own in solo queue having a good support let alone coordination is a rare sight.

Needs to have a mic and be willing to improve

replies.body: Just a tip, it seems that you die a lot in your games. One thing to get out of Bronze is to become less greedy and more careful. Although making plays is important dying means a lot more in Season 6. Try dying less.
I am sorry dude but If you are in Bronze 5 you really won't get anyone playing with you. You are only in bronze 5 because that's were you deserve to be so improve then come back to the boards.

Sorry bro my teemo support against ezreal and sona is here to disagree with you

"Not only will I not buy my gold item, I will play a champ with basically no purpose in this matchup. Forgo any defensive stats, utility stats or even damage stats, just to play teemo."

Or my illaoi support who went dorans + infinity edge

"I dont need to do anything here, I just sit and wait for gold to come in so I can have 2 items at 30 minutes"

Or the Thresh who left me to 2v1 because

"I hate Ezreal he is a trash champ who does no damage learn the game and stop playing such awful champs"

Despite that I was almost 2 thousand gold ahead of their draven and was short 1 or 2 shots in winning the 2v1.

Perhaps you would like to meet the rest of the team.

Like the 0/8 fiora at 10 minutes?

Or the 2/10 xin at 15 minutes?

Or the Ryze that flamed them both the whole game?

Or the game before?

The 3/10 kindred jg

Or the game before that?

The 1/8 darius and the team that refused to go try and engage until they were on nexus

More examples you beg?

The team where everyone went at most 4/12 and I had the lovely job of being the squishy adc that nobody has a clue how to protect and I have to rely on my own positioning to do anything useful without being immediately destroyed.

You say I deserve to be in Bronze 5 and yet the enemy adc is never the problem. The 10/2 assassin is, or the 10/2 bruiser. You know who's problem they are in teamfights? Mine. I have to deal with them because if I don't I will get one shot so my challenge every game is not to go even in lane. Its to crush the lane so convincingly that the 10/2 assassin/bruiser can't get near me

Can you guess now why I want someone to communicate with, in the hopes that maybe I can have atleast one useful teammate in every game?

Your going to have people like that all the time. Check my op.gg page and u can see I was b5 beginning of the season. I belonged in b5 because I truly was bad. Now I have improved and I am in silver 4. This is where I belong till I improve
